title: jagadishwari
sahitya:
jagadIshvari krpai puri 



(jagadIshvari)







anupallavi







agamagizhndun pAdattai anudinam pUjai paNNa



ihaparattirkk-udava villai enren manam eNNa 



(jagadIshvari)







caraNam







adigamAi shOdippadil aDimaikkenna shlAkyam ambA un dayavinri



aNDattilEdu yOgyam



gatiyenru nambinOrai kAppadE un vairAgyam karuttil nAn koNDadu



pOl kaTAkSikka vENum 



(jaga)
